document_data.name: Entemoch
document_data.mainbody:
'''Entemoch''', the '''Prince of Earth Elementals''', was a mighty [[earth elemental]], possibly an [[archomental]].At no point does it explicitly say that Entemoch is an archomental, but given that both Ogremoch, his supposed twin, and Sunnis, his consort, are archomentals it seems likely.
{{TOC limit|3}}
document_data.Description:
Entemoch resembled an earth elemental barely {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} tall, with smooth stone that showed no cracks, but which was nonetheless more unfinished, less polished in appearance, and only vaguely humanoid in form. He gave off an aura of power and completion that belied his simple form, and compassion was obvious on his face.
<!--==Personality==
document_data.History:
Just days before the end of the [[Time of Troubles]], a group of svirfneblin priests successfully summoned Entemoch in a cavern a day's walk northwest of Blingdenstone. His appearance, brief though it was, inspired joy in the svirfneblin of that city and left a mark on the location, which was thereafter called [[Entemoch's Boon]].
<!--==Rumors & Legends==-->
